summary:
Adds 23 Summonable Mounts (ArmoredGazelle,Gazelle,ValeDeer,Male/Female Elk,Moose,BullMoose,White/Spectral Stag,Foxes,Wolves,ValeSabrecat,Skeevers,Beaver,Raccoon,CaveLion,Eurasian/Canadian Lynx,Cougar) + 14 Followers (with new sounds)

Wild Animals: Beaver (7), Raccoon (7), Little Fox (8), Lynx (7), Cougar (5), Deer (7)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]Forest Mounts and Followers[/size] [/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b][size=3]Version 3.1 [/size][/b][/color] (The DLC DAWNGUARD IS REQUIRED)

If you have not DAWNGUARD, you can subscribe to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=460636134]Forest Mounts and Followers NO DLC version [/url]


23 Summonable Mounts: Armored Gazelle, Gazelle, Vale Deer, Male Elk*, Female Elk, Moose*, Bull Moose, White Stag, Spectral Stag, Foxes (2), Wolves (3), Vale Sabrecat, Skeevers (2), Beaver, Raccoon, Cave Lion, Eurasian Lynx, Canadian Lynx, Cougar, wherever you want.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Forest Mounts"

14 Followers/Companions near the South bridge of Ivarstead/Fort-Ivar (Silver Fox, Little Fox, Arctic Grey Fox, Timber Wolf, Male Deer, Female Deer, Fawn, Male Reindeer, Megaloceros, Beaver, Raccoon, Eurasian Lynx, Canadian Lynx, Cougar)

New (free) sounds for the Followers

[i][b]Adds Wild Animals near Ivarstead: Beaver (7), Raccoon (7), Little Fox (8), Lynx (7), Cougar (5), Fawn (3), Female Deer (2), Male Deer (2)
[/b][/i]

[color=#00ff00] Miscellaneous Files: No Follower No Wild Version 3.0BIS[/color]


*[i] Bethesda calls these animals [/i]: "Male Elk" for my Moose - "Female Elk" for my Male Elk !

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moose]Moose in Wikipedia [/url]
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_Elk]Irish elk (Megaloceros giganteus) [/url]
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deer]Deer in Wikipedia [/url]
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elk]Elk in Wikipedia [/url]
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reindeer]Reindeer in Wikipedia [/url]

To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/NiIJgjS.gif[/img]

With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52871/?] Sokco's Guild Starter [/url] you can recruited up to 10 guild members in your home (aka headquarters)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[img]http://25.media.tumblr.com/ecb237d53879097335eafa14a114debd/tumblr_mw3o5jii8H1si4ok7o1_400.gif[/img]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=277829armoredgazelle.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/277829armoredgazelle.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=786657forestmountsandfollowers3.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/786657forestmountsandfollowers3.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] INSTALLATION[/b][/color] (very important)

[color=#00ff00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#00ff00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) [color=#ff0000] You must place the .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 24 books...(Normally, this is done automatically) [/color]

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! to obtain the books (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX” and the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Forest Mounts" at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whitherun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the Spectral Stag)

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=333709forestmountsandfollowers4.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/333709forestmountsandfollowers4.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=255810Eurasianlynx.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/255810Eurasianlynx.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] Bugs or Problems[/b][/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

3) When you mount a Elk/Moose/Deer you must be patient a few seconds before moving !

If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...


[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=956015forestmountsandfollowers1.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/956015forestmountsandfollowers1.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b]Credits[/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]CRO White Wolf [/color] for his mod[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1082/? ] CRO White Wolf and Astarcis Wolf Textures [/url] With the Texture of the Desert (little)Fox

[color=#ff0000]Bellyache[/color] for his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3621/? ] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url] With the Textures of the Timber Wolf and Red/Silver/Arctic/ArcticGrey Foxes

[color=#ff0000]AlienSlof [/color] for his mod [url= http://www.slofslair.co.uk/index.php?page=modarticle&modarticle/id=63ce3yfpjrb ] Better Skeevers [/url](“ Use these textures freely”)

[color=#ff0000]Testiger2 and XP32[/color] for the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/? ]Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix [/url] ("Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder -testiger2-")

[color=#ff0000]Tumbajamba[/color] for the Meshes and the textures of the Gazelle and the Armored Gazelle (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

[color=#ff0000] gothic2392/ 530gothic25 [/color] for the meshes/textures of Beaver, Bull Moose, Female Elk, Raccoon, Male Deer, Female Deer, Fawn, Megaloceros, Cave Lion (sabrecat texture used on Cave Lion:[color=#ff0000] Bellyache[/color]), Eurasian Lynx, Canadian Lynx, Cougar, in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37999/?] Skyrim Wildlife Overhaul [/url] (“give me credit at least”)

Free sounds for the Followers

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=344292forestmountsandfollowers5.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/344292forestmountsandfollowers5.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=443474deerfamily1.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/443474deerfamily1.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=571629cougarfollower.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/571629cougarfollower.jpg[/img][/url]

Chinese site
[url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4371105-1-1.html] 3dmgame.com[/url]

Russian site [url=http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/sushhestva/summon_forest_mounts_and_followers_92_prizyv_lesnykh_mauntov_i_kompanonov/305-1-0-18897] Modgames [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=502433followerraccoon.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/502433followerraccoon.jpg[/img][/url]

files.name: Summon Forest Mounts and Followers 3.0.1
files.changelogHtml:
version 3.0.1: New settings for the wild animals + adds Wild Deer

version 3.0: New (free) Sounds for the Followers + Wild Animals near Ivarstead: Beaver (7), Raccoon (7), Little Fox (8), Lynx (7), Cougar (5)

version 2.1.1: Adds Gazelle, Beaver, Bull Moose, Female Elk, Raccoon, Male Deer, Female Deer, Fawn, Megaloceros, Cave Lion, Eurasian Lynx, Canadian Lynx, Cougar

version 1.3: You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Forest Mounts"

version 1.2: Adds a summonable Armored Gazelle (mount); only vanilla sounds for the foxes
